dict.string:
# BEWARE. Errors are suppressed. "${TM_TIDY:-tidy}" -f /dev/null -iq -utf8 -asxhtml --tab-size $TM_TAB_SIZE --indent-spaces $TM_TAB_SIZE|\ if [[ "$TM_SOFT_TABS" == "YES" ]]; then cat; else ruby -e ' in_pre = false tab_size = ENV["TM_TAB_SIZE"].to_i STDIN.each { |line|
# convert leading spaces to tabs indent, text = line.match(/^( *)(.*)$/)[1..2] puts in_pre ? line : "\t" * (indent.length / tab_size).floor + " " * (indent.length % tab_size) + text
if(line =~ /<pre>(?!.*<\/pre>)/) in_pre = true elsif(line =~ /<\/pre>/) in_pre = false end
}' fi
